item.title: Systematic reviews
item.description: I find learning about productivity fascinating, yet I’m aware that in the end, a simple set of rules and systems is what works best for me. These systems will continue to evolve over time, but I have found that the simpler they are, the more likely I am to stick with them. This post describes my current digital take on dealing with everyday life.
item.dc:creator: Sébastien Lavoie
